Managing in the game Handy:
Reviewer for 5 minutes to check the units!
Taking part in the game, You become a Reviewer! If you hit with a hammer on the block...
BAH! Color block changing! the winner is the team that in 5 minutes will be more blocks of other colors!
During the game, all magical effects are removed! And remember that even after the end of the competition it is impossible to impose new effects!
